lead_paragraph: A young group of quickly maturing defensemen nearly pushed the Carolina Hurricanes into the playoffs last season. Now they're hoping for a similar boost at the other end of the rink.

headline.main: Young Hurricanes Look to Take Another Step Forward
headline.print_headline: Young Hurricanes Look to Take Another Step Forward
